Getting Started

Apr 29, 2015

Step 1

Sign up to our developers console to get a developer ID.

Step 2

Download our SDK (From here or through the console). Implement it using our guides in this wiki

Step 3

After the SDK is implemented, launch your app and you should see your app in your developer console with the state “Unverified”.

Step 4

Upload your updated app to the store, we will verify your app once it is published.

After that you’ll be able to see in the console parameters regarding your app.
